attributes.action: UK Prime minister Teresa May to stand down IMMEDIATELY!
attributes.additional_details:
It is our desire that she resign with immediate effect and allow the government to select a new more competent leader. 

The current prime minister is not representing the wishes of the sovereign peoples of the United Kingdom and therefore must be replaced.
attributes.background: The Undersigned people of the United Kingdom hereby declare that they have lost all confidence that Prime Minister Teresa May is competent enough to lead the Government and the countries of our union.

rejection.details: The resignation of a Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
